short_summary: CBSA requires printing services for the supply of E14 forms.
description: The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) requires an Offeror to provide printing services for the supply of the CBSA E14 forms. The services of the Offeror are required from the date of contract issuance until March 31, 2025, with three (3) possible extensions of one (1) year each, up to March 31, 2028.
full_summary:
**CBSA Postal Import Form - E14 - B**
==========================

### Tender Details

| Size | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS4254480946-Doc4463815062 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4254480946 |
| **Purchase Order on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) | [View Details](https://buyandsellzbtc) |
| **Solicitation Date** | 2024-02-27 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2024-03-04T14:00:00 |

### Notice Type

This is a competitive tender for a Standing Offer (SO) for the supply of the CBSA E14 forms.

### Contract Details

| Size | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Goods/Services** | Printing Services for CBSA E14 forms |
| **Contract Period** | From the date of contract issuance until March 31, 2025, with three possible extensions of one year each (up to March 31, 2028) |

### Bid Opportunities

* Tender invites interested bidders to submit their bid for the Standing Offer
* Bids must be submitted electronically through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS)

### Requirement Description

The CBSA is looking to purchase printing services for the supply of its E14 forms and requires an Offeror to provide the necessary printing services from January 2015 date of contract issuance until March 31, 2025, with possible extensions until March 31 2028, Thai Commercial Code :
